Omiscid::ConnectorListener

Omiscid::ConnectorListener Class Reference

#include <ConnectorListener.h>

Public Member Functions

virtual void MessageReceived (Service &TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, const Message &Msg)

virtual void Disconnected (Service &TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId)

Detailed Description

Defines the listener interface for Omiscid messages. This interface must be implemented in order to receive notifications on Omiscid messages receptions.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

Definition at line 28 of file ConnectorListener.h.

Member Function Documentation

void ConnectorListener::MessageReceived ( Service &  TheService,
const SimpleString  LocalConnectorName,
const Message &  Msg 
) [virtual]

Processes a received Omiscid message. As a given message could be processed by several others listeners, the message must not be modified by its processing.

Parameters:
TheService the service which received the message
LocalConnectorName the name of the connector that has received the message
Msg the message to process
Processes a received Omiscid message. As a given message could be processed by several others listeners, the message must not be modified by its processing.
Parameters:
service the service receiving the message
localConnectorName the name of the connector that has received the message
